alterego_mod:Cooking.NAME: Cooking
alterego_mod:Cooking.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Apply 1 Poison. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Cooking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Apply 2 Poison. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Birthday.NAME: Birthday
alterego_mod:Birthday.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Birthday.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Maid.NAME: Maid
alterego_mod:Maid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Lose 1 Dexterity.

alterego_mod:Venus.NAME: Venus
alterego_mod:Venus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
alterego_mod:Venus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

alterego_mod:Swimsuit.NAME: Swimsuit
alterego_mod:Swimsuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable and !M! Frail.

alterego_mod:Pet.NAME: Pet
alterego_mod:Pet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.

alterego_mod:Belts.NAME: Belts
alterego_mod:Belts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain X Block. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Belts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 2X Block. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.NAME: Presence Concealment
alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next X turns.
alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next X+2 turns.

alterego_mod:Lift.NAME: Lift
alterego_mod:Lift.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every !M! HP you're missing.

alterego_mod:BiFurious.NAME: Bi-Furious
alterego_mod:BiFurious.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength this turn. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

alterego_mod:1TonWallop.NAME: 1 Ton Wallop
alterego_mod:1TonWallop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Take 4 damage.

alterego_mod:Mirror.NAME: Mirror
alterego_mod:Mirror.DESCRIPTION: Perform the enemy's intent on them.
alterego_mod:Mirror.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Perform the enemy's intent on ALL enemies.

alterego_mod:SakuraPetals.NAME: Sakura Petals
alterego_mod:SakuraPetals.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

alterego_mod:BigMeatyClaws.NAME: Big Meaty Claws
alterego_mod:BigMeatyClaws.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Add X *Shivs to your hand.
alterego_mod:BigMeatyClaws.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Add X+2 *Shivs to your hand.

alterego_mod:ClassAdvantage.NAME: Class Advantage
alterego_mod:ClassAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Deal 10% more damge. NL Take 10% less damage.
alterego_mod:ClassAdvantage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 15% more damge. NL Take 15% less damage.

alterego_mod:PainIsPleasure.NAME: Pain is Pleasure
alterego_mod:PainIsPleasure.DESCRIPTION: Taking damage instead heals you this turn.

alterego_mod:IdEs.NAME: Id_es
alterego_mod:IdEs.DESCRIPTION: Play every card in your exhaust pile, then Exhaust.
alterego_mod:IdEs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play every card in your exhaust pile, then Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Clones.NAME: "Clones"
alterego_mod:Clones.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of a card in your hand to your hand. The copy gains Retain.
alterego_mod:Clones.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add two copies of a card in your hand to your hand. The copies gain Retain.

alterego_mod:RidiculouslyBig.NAME: Ridiculously Big
alterego_mod:RidiculouslyBig.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Reduce the amount by 4 until the end of combat; Exhaust if it reaches 0.

alterego_mod:Clap.NAME: Clap
alterego_mod:Clap.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL This turn, your next Attack is played twice.
alterego_mod:Clap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL This turn, your next two Attacks are played twice.

alterego_mod:Cushion.NAME: Cushion
alterego_mod:Cushion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust. NL Shuffle a *Cushion into your draw pile.

alterego_mod:DeftHands.NAME: Deft Hands
alterego_mod:DeftHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Gain !B! Block.

alterego_mod:DustData.NAME: Dust Data
alterego_mod:DustData.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Kill a non-boss enemy. NL Become cursed: *Regret.
alterego_mod:DustData.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Kill a non-boss enemy.

alterego_mod:BrynhildrsRune.NAME: Brynhildr's Rune
alterego_mod:BrynhildrsRune.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !B! Block.

alterego_mod:BrynhildrRomantia.NAME: Brynhildr Romantia
alterego_mod:BrynhildrRomantia.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!.

alterego_mod:PerceptionDisorder.NAME: Perception Disorder
alterego_mod:PerceptionDisorder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL You won't see enemy intents until the end of combat.

alterego_mod:Punishment.NAME: Punishment
alterego_mod:Punishment.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, gain [E]. NL At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.
alterego_mod:Punishment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each turn, gain [E]. NL At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for every 2 cards in your hand.

alterego_mod:BeGentle.NAME: Be Gentle
alterego_mod:BeGentle.DESCRIPTION: Enemy heals !M! and loses its action this turn.

alterego_mod:Schoolgirl.NAME: Schoolgirl
alterego_mod:Schoolgirl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

alterego_mod:PurpleHair.NAME: Purple Hair
alterego_mod:PurpleHair.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Block, gain 1 Thorns for every !M! lost. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Tantrum.NAME: Tantrum
alterego_mod:Tantrum.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Your attacks deal double damage for 3 turns.

alterego_mod:Valkyrie.NAME: Valkyrie
alterego_mod:Valkyrie.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Regen.

alterego_mod:GIGAMILK.NAME: GIGA MILK
alterego_mod:GIGAMILK.DESCRIPTION: ALL COMBATANTS GAIN STRENGTH EQUAL TO YOUR STRENGTH.
alterego_mod:GIGAMILK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL COMBATANTS GAIN STRENGTH EQUAL TO YOUR STRENGTH. NL (excluding target enemy)

alterego_mod:Stockings.NAME: Stockings
alterego_mod:Stockings.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak, twice.

alterego_mod:DiscoLights.NAME: Disco Lights
alterego_mod:DiscoLights.DESCRIPTION: Every other time you play a *Shiv, gain !M! Temporary_HP.
alterego_mod:DiscoLights.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you play a *Shiv, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

alterego_mod:BoobPocket.NAME: Boob Pocket
alterego_mod:BoobPocket.DESCRIPTION: Purge a card from your hand. NL Startup: alterego_mod:Swipe all cards this purged last combat.

alterego_mod:HighServant.NAME: High Servant
alterego_mod:HighServant.DESCRIPTION: alterego_mod:Swipe a card that would change your Stance.

alterego_mod:IndependentAction.NAME: Independent Action
alterego_mod:IndependentAction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy. NL Increase this card's energy gain by 1 until the end of combat.

alterego_mod:Impale.NAME: Impale
alterego_mod:Impale.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Parvati. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Enemy gains 2 Strength. NL Deal !D! damage.
alterego_mod:Impale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Parvati. NL Gain 3 Strength. NL Enemy gains 1 Strength. NL Deal !D! damage.

alterego_mod:Collar.NAME: Collar
alterego_mod:Collar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.
